26 #pragma once
27 
28 #include "CachedResourceHandle.h"
29 #include "CachedSVGDocumentClient.h"
30 #include <wtf/text/WTFString.h>
31 
32 namespace WebCore {
33 
34 class CachedSVGDocument;
35 class CachedResourceLoader;
36 struct ResourceLoaderOptions;
37 
38 class CachedSVGDocumentReference final : public CachedSVGDocumentClient {
39     WTF_MAKE_FAST_ALLOCATED;
40 public:
41     CachedSVGDocumentReference(const String&);
42 
43     virtual ~CachedSVGDocumentReference();
44 
45     void load(CachedResourceLoader&, const ResourceLoaderOptions&);
46     bool loadRequested() const { return m_loadRequested; }
47 
48     CachedSVGDocument* document() { return m_document.get(); }
49 
50 private:
51     String m_url;
52     CachedResourceHandle<CachedSVGDocument> m_document;
53     bool m_loadRequested;
54 };
55 
56 } // namespace WebCore
--- EOF ---
